scripts.build:css: stylus stylus/main.styl -o static/main.css && cat static/typeahead.css static/main.css > /tmp/bundle && mv /tmp/bundle static/main.css && gzip -c static/main.css > static/main.css.gz
scripts.build:js: scripts/writeAssetMaps.js && browserify client/js/main.js -t [ babelify --presets [ env stage-2 ] ] -t [ envify --NODE_ENV PRODUCTION ]  | uglifyjs > static/debug/bundle.js && gzip -c static/debug/bundle.js > static/bundle.js.gz
scripts.build:js-debug: scripts/writeAssetMaps.js && browserify client/js/main.js -o static/debug/debug.js -d -t [ babelify --presets [ env stage-2 ] --ignore [ /node_modules/ ] ] -t [ envify --NODE_ENV DEVELOPMENT ] && gzip -c static/debug/debug.js > static/debug/debug.js.gz
scripts.build:js-staging: scripts/writeAssetMaps.js && browserify client/js/main.js -o static/debug/staging.js -d -t [ babelify --presets [ env stage-2 ] --ignore [ /node_modules/ ] ] -t [ envify --NODE_ENV STAGING ] && gzip -c static/debug/staging.js > static/debug/staging.js.gz
scripts.build:watch: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js & npm run livereload
